channel.title: What do you think? - WebHost Reseller
channel.description:
So I'm starting a webhost reseller acc and after finishing the site I was thinking about offering something strictly to the mopar community.
The first 10 people would get free hosting for a year(buy your domain from us or somewhere else) and the next 200 people would get a free month if they purchase a year package(you wouldn't be charged until the first month is over)
Is that something you guys would be in to or am I wasting my time trying to give back to the comm?

item.title: What do you think? - WebHost Reseller
item.dc:creator: @my-swagger my-swagger
item.description:
@my-swagger wrote:

Pure_:

wasting time

Read full topic
